name: Contrapti0n
description:
Super simple and short puzzle game developed for Ludum Dare 37 over the course of about 25 hours.

The theme for this Ludum Dare was One Room. I took this concept jiggled it around a bit and made a little game about a machine that has only room for one input at a time.

Goal of the game is to deposit the coloured packages at the defined Deposit points using the simple commands given to you.

Made Using:

Unity

Inkscape
